alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:33PM EDT until August 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN...NORTHEASTERN HAWKINS...SOUTHERN RUSSELL...SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF BRISTOL... At 532 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Abingdon to Bristol Va to Kingsport, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Gate City, Weber City, Colonial Heights, Walnut Hill and Church Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 59 and 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington
